issue_comments.body: Sorry for the late reply, I missed the related newsfeed on ZeroHello. Added! Thanks for reporting :D

For searching title, you can hit "TOC by date" on the left panel and search with browser search feature, for content search, it's a bit too hard for me to implement it, and I think tag system is enough for reader, anyone who is interested in it can make a PR for me though. Leave it opened.

Also if you really want to search content, here is my suggestion:

`sqlite3 /path/to/blog/data/zeroblog.db`

`select body from post where body like "%keyword%";`

You can learn some basic SQLite function and do it in a more advanced way ;)

issues.title: Content disappear when editing a blog
issues.body:
ZeroBlog auto-refreshes (updates) the page when another user (visitor) comments or hit the like button.. And it results that the content disappeared when editing the page. It may also happen when the websocket connect is suddenly down and up again.

Temporary solution: Edit the article with local editor then paste it to ZeroBlog, or using Ctrl-a Ctrl-s to save content to clipboard when editing.
